name: 張彥元
objective:
本課程旨在帶領學生閱讀、理解並分析各類學術英文主題內容，提高學生於聽說讀寫之能力，透過對多元主體之解析，讓學生了解單字用法，句型結構，特殊術語和慣用語，與文章主旨等，提升閱讀能力，並配合聽力技巧學習，提升理解能力，同時以不同主題，練習口語摘要與寫作能力。
This course intends to enhance students’ reading, speaking, listening and writing abilities by introducing material from various subjects of academic English. It will help students enrich their vocabulary and acquire key English expressions, sentence patterns, and main ideas in academic articles. Students will learn to read, discuss, and listen to different subjects through diverse forms of activities.
